import Masonry,{ResponsiveMasonry}from"react-responsive-masonry";import TaskList from"./TaskList";import{HelpCircle}from"react-feather";import"../styles/AllTaskLists.css";import{useEffect,useState}from"react";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";export default function AllTaskLists(){//holds objects that represent each list
const[taskLists,setTaskLists]=useState([]);//manages local storage, saves taskLists state to local storage everytime it changes
useEffect(()=>{const taskListsFromLocal=JSON.parse(localStorage.getItem("taskLists"));console.log(taskListsFromLocal);if(taskListsFromLocal==null){localStorage.setItem("taskLists",JSON.stringify([{title:"Welcome to To Do Garden ❀༉‧˚.",currentItems:["Check off tasks to grow flowers!","Click the three dots to edit lists or delete lists","After clicking 'edit list' start typing to edit tasks or title","delete this list and create your own!"],checkedItems:[],editModeDisplayed:false,optionsDisplayed:false,isWelcomeList:true,completedDisplayed:false}]));setTaskLists([{title:"Welcome to To Do Garden!",currentItems:["Check off tasks to grow flowers!","Click the three dots to edit lists or delete lists","After clicking 'edit list' start typing to edit tasks or title","delete this list and create your own!"],checkedItems:[],editModeDisplayed:false,optionsDisplayed:false,isWelcomeList:true,completedDisplayed:false}]);}else{setTaskLists(taskListsFromLocal);}},[]);useEffect(()=>{if(taskLists!=null&&taskLists.length>0){localStorage.setItem("taskLists",JSON.stringify(taskLists));}},[taskLists]);// Creates new list in taskLists state
function handleNewList(){setTaskLists([...taskLists,{title:"",currentItems:[],checkedItems:[],editModeDisplayed:true,optionsDisplayed:false,isWelcomeList:false}]);}return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{id:"website-container",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("header",{id:"homepage-header",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{id:"homepage-title",children:"To Do Garden \uD83C\uDF37"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:"blue-button",onClick:event=>{handleNewList(event);},children:"+ New List"})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(ResponsiveMasonry,{columnsCountBreakPoints:{700:1,800:2,1200:3},children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Masonry,{gutter:"2vw",children:taskLists.map((taskList,index)=>{return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(TaskList,{listIndex:index,taskLists:taskLists,setTaskLists:setTaskLists});})})})]});}
